settings.name: Juan Pérez
settings.description:
In charge of leading and directing the company, establishing
                objectives and strategies for the growth and success of the
                travel agency.

settings.name: María González
settings.description:
Responsible for sales management and the implementation of
                strategies to increase revenue and the customer

settings.name: Alejandro Ramírez
settings.description:
In charge of planning and coordinating the agency's operations,
                ensuring that services are provided efficiently and complying
                with quality standards.

settings.name: Carlos Martínez
settings.description:
In charge of developing and executing marketing strategies to
                promote the services of the travel agency, increasing the
                visibility and recognition of the brand.

settings.name: Ana Silva
settings.description:
Responsible for researching and evaluating tourist destinations,
                designing attractive and personalized packages for clients, and
                providing detailed information about the destinations.

settings.name: Sofía López
settings.description:
Responsible for providing customer service, advising and
                resolving any questions or problems that customers may have,
                ensuring a satisfactory travel experience.

settings.section1_desc: Our history begins with the vision of being a leading travel agency in our region, offering our clients a unique and memorable experience. Since our beginnings, we have focused on providing confidence and security to our clients, becoming their trusted travel companion. Thanks to our commitment to quality and innovation, we have managed to establish ourselves in the market, offering high-quality tourist services and maintaining a stable tourist activity in the region. We are proud to foster an environment of good relations with our clients and collaborators, and our main objective is to obtain the total satisfaction of our clients. We are excited to continue growing and exploring new horizons together.
settings.mision_desc: Provide high-quality, personalized travel solutions that help our clients create unforgettable memories and experience the world in a unique way.
settings.vision_desc: To be recognized as a leader in the travel industry by providing exceptional customer service, personalized travel options and the best prices available.

settings.question:
What sanitary measures are you taking during the
                        pandemic?
settings.answer:
We are taking all necessary measures to ensure the safety
                      of our customers and employees, including regularly
                      removing our vehicles and accommodations, wearing masks,
                      and implementing social distancing measures.

settings.question: What are the accepted payment methods?
settings.answer:
We accept payment by credit card, bank transfer and cash
                      at our offices.

settings.question:
Do the tourist packages include transportation from my
                        city of origin?
settings.answer:
No, the tourist packages do not include transportation
                      from your city of origin. However, we can offer you
                      recommendations and advice to help you plan your trip.

settings.title: BEST SELLERS
settings.about_desc: Our company seeks to be a recognized Travel Agency in our region, for the trust and security that we offer our clients, presenting innovative services and ensuring a stable tourist activity, promoting an environment of good relations and obtaining the greatest satisfaction from our clients. .
